name: Dark Relic
description: Drew Rivers is lured into a toyshop. He meets Fiona Weaver who owns Weaver’s Toys. She is also a powerful fortune teller who has made a deal with the spiritual world to become immortal. Drew enters her shop one night and begins to get to know Fiona. She realizes that Drew has the perfect soul to offer to the God of Death, so she convinces Drew to accept a future reading but ultimately it leads him into a trap. Once he is under her spell, Drew must navigate throughout her toyshop and find clues to break the spell. Drew only has a matter of time to reverse the curse before the full moon rises or be trapped inside of a doll body forever. The player can choose different outcomes of decision making that will determine Drew’s fate.
